text: The women's 100 metres hurdles event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 17, 18 and 19 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Susanna Kallur ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Fanny Gérance ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Adriana Lamalle ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19 October Wind: -1.7m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
